member.name: P:Telerik.Drawing.Skia.Font.Size

member.name: M:Telerik.Drawing.Skia.Graphics.MeasureString(System.String,Telerik.Drawing.IFont,System.Drawing.SizeF,Telerik.Drawing.StringFormatBase,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Measures a string with provided font and string format within certain layout area.
member.param: Can be empty or with negative width/height. Allowed for cases where we just want to get the size of the measured text.
Number of chars that fit in the passed layoutArea.
Number of lines that fit in the passed layoutArea.
